info.name: Couchtuner Elegant~
info.description: This style flattens the overall appearance of the site and hides irrelevant elements. Overall, I believe it provides a very modern and minimal design. The list of television shows in the sidebar on the right is given an opacity value so that it's darker than the rest of the content, thus putting more emphasis on the video player and comment section. The huge excess of random br elements are hidden, thus condensing the content. This style assumes that if you know how to use Stylish, you're already aware of the basic troubleshooting tips provided by Couchtuner and hides those. Player tabs no longer have a border and are made light grey instead of bright yellow, which is significantly less obnoxious. The navigation bar fades into the background, again, putting more emphasis on the video player and the comments. The site's banner and most promotional links are hidden. Ads are not removed. If you want to hide ads, use uBlock.
info.additionalInfo: 08/23/16 - 01.9.1 --- * added support for couch-tuner.ag and couch-tuner.city domains 05/19/2016 - 01.9 --- * added small shadows to certain elements to interrupt the flatness of this style -- bug: disqus overlaps shadow when scrolled to the bottom of the feed 3/22/2016 - 01.8 --- * Added "couchtuner.fr" and "iwatchonline.us" to supported domains -- Bug: input boxes on iwatchonline.us are same colour as content -- Bug: nav bar on couchtuner.fr isn't displayed -- Human error: i have no immediate plans on fixing these bugs^ 3/13/2016 - 01.6 --- * Added comments to the css 1/2/2016 - 01.5 --- * Fixed the broken TV-List and search pages - 01.6 --- * Set a text-decoration to none * Removed extra semicolons on lines 97-98, added missing semicolon on line 99 12/31/2015 - 01.3 --- * Reduced link hover transition by half a second * Hid a few more excess elements the original style didn't account for -- Bug: TV-List page is broken 12/29/2015 - 01 --- * Release -- Bug: input on the search page clips the bottom of .post
